how does this work i've tried winzip & winrar but it won't work

Here's what I did to get this game to work:

1. Rename the file rzr-toc.001 to rzr-toc.r01 and extract it with winrar.

2. You will be prompted with a pop-up box asking you to locate the .r02 file. Change that file extension to .002 and winrar will proceed to build   a bin annd cue file.

3 From there I used Magic ISO to build the ISO file from the bin and cue files.

4. When yopu extract or mount the ISO file there is a setup.exe in the root directory. Run this first (it will take a while to install)

5. After it installs there is another setup file in the DX9 folder. You MUST run and install this for the game to work.

I followed the above steps and everything works fine. I am loving this game.
